JULY 23, 2023 My new journey as a bootcamp student I'm excited to start a new learning journey! After several months of learning in the Frontend Developer Career Path.

How I stay committed to learning

I like to think of myself as a lifelong learner. I used to spend hours and hours learning, then try to create simple projects using what I learned or work new techniques into existing projects. While that was fun, I felt like it would be helpful to share what I was learning and most things about my journey with the
